DataElement.preferredName: Diarrhea During Current Cycle Total Day Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric representation of the total number of days of diarrhea during the current treatment cycle.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Diarrhea During Current Therapy Cycle Total Day Number
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Watery bowel movements._At some point in a given period of time._The name of the therapy that is currently being administered._An event or sequence of events that constitute a round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence._Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition._The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day._A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A condition of frequent and watery bowel movements.

Property.preferredName: During Current Therapy Cycle Total Day Number
Property.preferredDefinition: At some point in a given period of time.:The name of the therapy that is currently being administered.:An event or sequence of events that constitute a round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence.:Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.:The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.:A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

Concepts.definition: At some point in a given period of time.
The name of the therapy that is currently being administered.
An event or sequence of events that constitute a round or succession of observable phenomena, recurring usually at regular or approximately regular time intervals and in the same sequence.
Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for MHRI GU IRB# 2015-0547: HALT-D protocol, Bowel Movement Endpoint form. 6/6/17 mc

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours.:To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
Determining the number or amount of something.
